metadata.Title: CVE-2023-23559 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
In rndis_query_oid in drivers/net/wireless/rndis_wlan.c in the Linux kernelthrough 6.1.5, there is an integer overflow in an addition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-23559` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-146-generic - 5.4.0-146.163
linux-image-5.4.0-146-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-146.163
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-146-generic - 5.4.0-146.163
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-146-lowlatency - 5.4.0-146.163
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-69-generic - 5.15.0-69.76~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-69-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-69.76~20.04.1
